## layouts.Api.getItem() method

Gets a layout item associated to the current context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getItem(itemId: string): Promise<LayoutMatterItem>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  itemId | string | the layout item to retrieve. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[LayoutMatterItem](./smokeball-client-sdk.layouts.layoutmatteritem.md)<!-- -->&gt;

the specified layout item.

## Example


```
// Returns a layout item.
const item = await sdk.layouts.getItem('21e9a129-8fa3-4a94-812c-123d7716df8e');
```
